title: Different Kinds of Sharks
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 51 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: Sharks are powerful animals that come in many shapes and sizes. Different Kinds of Sharks builds upon children's fascination with these sea animals to teach simple information about the differences among various shark species. Striking photographs support the text.
meta: different, sharks, sharp, spots, stripes, teeth
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial and Final Consonants : Discriminate initial and final consonant /s/ sound
Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Ss
Capitalization : Capitalize the beginning of sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
